description: With heavy hearts, the Justia Team shares the news that an invaluable member of the team, Donovan Coronado, passed away last month. Donovan contributed immensely to Justia and our clients over the past 7 years and is remembered for his dedication, creative spirit, and kind nature. His loss is felt by all Justians, and he is missed immensely.
We are excited to introduce Zoey, the newest Hug Pug. At 6 months old, she is playful and eager to explore her surroundings. We are excited to watch her grow and share her adventures with all of you!
